trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting" /> and <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting" /> events.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting" /> 和 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting" /> 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting> event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnecting%2A> method, and it indicates that the connection process has begun (for example, a user has selected a control and clicked a connect verb), but is not yet completed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting>就會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnecting%2A>方法，且它會指出已經開始連線程序 （例如，使用者已選取的控制項並按一下連接的動詞命令），但尚未完成。

trans-unit.source: The event provides an opportunity to cancel a connection before it is complete.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件會提供完成之前取消連線的機會。

trans-unit.source: If the connection is successfully completed, this event is followed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果已成功完成連線，此事件後面接著<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnecting%2A> method, and it indicates that a user has clicked a disconnect verb, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> method has otherwise been called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting>就會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnecting%2A>方法，而且它會指出使用者已按一下中斷連接動詞命令或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A>否則呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: The event provides an opportunity to cancel the process of ending a connection before it is complete.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件會提供取消處理程序完成之前結束連接的機會。

trans-unit.source: If the connection is ended successfully, this event is followed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果連接就會順利結束，此事件後面接著<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs> class contains information about the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs>類別包含下列資訊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting>事件。

trans-unit.source: It provides access to the Web Parts controls that are being connected or disconnected.
trans-unit.target: 它提供在 Web 組件控制項存取連線或中斷連線。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control providing data in the connection.
trans-unit.target: 提供連接中之資料的 Web 組件控制項。

trans-unit.source: The connection point for providing data.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料的連接點。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control consuming data in the connection.
trans-unit.target: 使用連接中之資料的 Web 組件控制項。

trans-unit.source: The connection point for consuming data.
trans-unit.target: 使用資料的連接點。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs" /> class without a specified connection.
trans-unit.target: 不使用指定的連接，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control providing data in the connection.
trans-unit.target: 提供連接中之資料的 Web 組件控制項。

trans-unit.source: The connection point for providing data.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料的連接點。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control consuming data in the connection.
trans-unit.target: 使用連接中之資料的 Web 組件控制項。

trans-unit.source: The connection point for consuming data.
trans-unit.target: 使用資料的連接點。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts connection involved in the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting" /> or <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 包含在 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting" /> 或 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting" /> 事件中的 Web 組件連接。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs" /> class with the specified connection.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的連接，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Web Parts connection involved in the event.
trans-unit.target: 取得事件中所包含的 Web 組件連接。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> involved in the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting" /> or <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting" /> event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> 或 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting" /> 事件中所包含的 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Web Parts control acting as the consumer in the connection.
trans-unit.target: 取得做為連接之消費者的 Web 組件控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> acting as the consumer in the connection.
trans-unit.target: 做為連接中之消費者的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the connection point that consumes data in the Web Parts connection.
trans-unit.target: 取得 Web 組件連接中之使用資料的連接點。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Web Parts control acting as the provider in the connection.
trans-unit.target: 取得做為連接中之提供者的 Web 組件控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> acting as the provider in the connection.
trans-unit.target: 做為連接中之提供者的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the connection point that provides data in the Web Parts connection.
trans-unit.target: 取得 Web 組件連接中之提供資料的連接點。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint" />。
